1230580.name: EarthNight Soundtrack
1230580.description:
EarthNight is an illustrated epic 2D platformer that takes place in a dystopian future just after the dragon apocalypse. This album comprises the game's full electronic/chiptune/rockin' soundtrack, including full-band and Game Boy-only versions, and more.

Special Thanks: First and foremost, the entire Cleaversoft Team, especially Rich Siegel, Adam Nash, Paul Davey and Zach Cohen; Josh Steingard; Hitoshi Sakimoto, Yoshimi Kudo and Jayson Napolitano; Katie Dempsey; Zach Goldstein and everyone at Kawari; Chris Burke; Dino Lionetti and the rest of Cheap Dinosaurs; 8static; all the chiptune movers, shakers and fans around the world; my family; and everyone, past, present and future, who has helped make this soundtrack — and more importantly, game — a reality. I hope your ears enjoy it, and I hope you have some fun.

Paul Weinstein: Game Boy, Guitar, Various Synths, Bass and Extra Percussion on “Truce,” Production

Josh Steingard: Drums

Additional Engineering and Mixing by Zach Goldstein
Drums Recorded at Kawari Sound
Mastered by Chris Burke
Art and Design by Paul Davey
1230580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
